Articles.Content:
Guys I just watched a video on YouTube about building a propeller but it involves offsetting a piece away from its parent part. The game restricted me from offsetting a piece off the parent part. Can anyone teach me to disable that function?

Thx

Are you clicking on the button on the upper left and then click-holding as you slide the arrows on the parts? 

Because that should work for everybody in the stock game. 

Oh, also, welcome to the forum, and your question has been moved to its own thread.
